pr_title: Add appformer-js dependency to prevent js projects from building in parallel

timeline.message: AF-1799: Add appformer-js as dependency to appformer-js-monaco.

timeline.bodyText:
What about provided?
In addition, if we want to make sure none of these modules (appformer-js, appformer-js-monaco and dashbuilder-js) are compiled in parallel here it is better to depend on appformer-js-monaco so the the flow will be hardcoded as appformer-js -> appformer-js-monaco -> dashbuilder-js
Wdyt?
timeline.author: danielezonca
